references.paper_title: Structured denoising diffusion models in discrete state-spaces
references.reason: This paper introduced the foundational concept of discrete diffusion models, which is directly built upon in the current work.

references.paper_title: Discrete diffusion language modeling by estimating the ratios of the data distribution
references.reason: This paper is a state-of-the-art discrete diffusion model for language modeling, which the current work aims to improve upon with a continuous approach.

references.paper_title: Simple and effective masked diffusion language models
references.reason: This paper is another state-of-the-art discrete diffusion model for language modeling that provides a key comparison point for the current work.

references.paper_title: Generative modeling on manifolds through mixture of riemannian diffusion processes
references.reason: This paper provides the theoretical foundation for the Riemannian diffusion framework used in the current work.

references.paper_title: Categorical flow matching on statistical manifolds
references.reason: This paper presents a related approach of flow matching on the statistical manifold, which the current work generalizes to a wider class of diffusion processes.
